svcproc.title: Fast Idle Advance
svcproc.para: Fast idle advance increases engine idle speed up to 750 rpm for faster warm-up to operating temperature. This occurs by the ECM monitoring the EOT sensor input and adjusting the fuel injector operation accordingly.
Low idle speed is increased proportionally when the engine oil temperature is between 15 °C (59 °F) at 700 rpm to below -10 °C (14 °F) at 750 rpm.
